anya-e0401n8:1_2: Vidito viññāto nāmarūpa vibhāgo yenāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:1_10: Kathaṁ kasiṇabhāvanādikaṁ yogakammaṁ attāva attano ṭhānaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘ādimajjhapariyosānānaṁhī’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:1_12: ‘‘Padaṭṭhānatāyā’’ti etena tiṭṭhati anivattamānaṁ pavattati etenāti ṭhānanti atthena padaṭṭhānameva ṭhānanti vuccatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:1_14: ‘‘Dasakasiṇānī’’tiādīsu mukhyato vā upacārato vā dvidhāpi atthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘dasakasiṇānī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_21: ‘‘Sabbāyapi appanāyā’’ti jhānappanāya ca maggappanāya ca phalappanāya ca.
anya-e0401n8:1_28: Tathāhi visuddhimagge vāyokasiṇa vidhāne caturaṅgulappamāṇaṁ sīsaṁ vātena pahariyamānaṁ disvāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:1_30: ‘‘Kataṁ vā’’ti nīlādivaṇṇavisesarahitaṁ aruṇavaṇṇaṁ mattikakkhaṇḍaṁ udakena madditvā cakkamaṇḍalaṁ viya
anya-e0401n8:1_33: ‘‘Akataṁ vā’’ti katthaci bhūmibhāge kenaci akataṁ sayaṁ jātaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:2_0: Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
anya-e0401n8:4_1: Tattha jambudīpassa kasiṇato sāpītivarā evāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:4_3: Sakalassa jambudīpamaṇḍalassa issariyādhipatito pīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:4_5: ‘‘Saṇṭhāna paññattī’’ti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānena upaṭṭhitā nimittapaññatti eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:4_8: Candasūriyānaṁ aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhāti samāso.
anya-e0401n8:5_10: ‘‘Tadeva puna paccitvā’’ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
anya-e0401n8:5_16: ‘‘Apakaḍḍhitvā’’ti khaṇḍāni sarīrato mocetvā taṁ taṁ padesaṁ kaḍḍhitvā.
anya-e0401n8:6_1: Guṇino dabbassa nāmena guṇānaṁ gahetabbattāti vuttaṁ ‘‘buddhaguṇassa anussati buddhānussatī’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:6_4: Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṁ vigatamalamaccheraṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_6: ‘‘Attanā adhigatanibbānañcā’’ti etena ariyapuggalānaṁ kilesānaṁ accantavūpasamo vutto.
anya-e0401n8:6_8: Hitūpasaṁhāro nāma ayaṁ puggalo avero hotu,
anya-e0401n8:6_9: abyāpajjo hotūtiādinā averatādīni hitasukhāni tasmiṁ puggale cittena upasaṁharaṇaṁ. Karuṇā, muditā,
anya-e0401n8:6_11: Hitūpasaṁhāro ca hitamodanā ca ahitāpanayanañcāti dvando.
anya-e0401n8:6_15: Tattha paraṁ hitasukhasampannaṁ disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṁ hitamodanā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_16: Paraṁ dukkhitaṁ disvā ayaṁ imamhādukkhā muccatu,
anya-e0401n8:6_17: mākilamatūti evaṁ cittena parasmiṁ ahitassa dukkhassa apanayanaṁ ahitāpanayanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_21: Attanā katakammaṁ eva sakaṁ yesaṁ te kammassakā.
anya-e0401n8:6_25: ‘‘Sīmasambhedo’’ti attā ca piyapuggalo ca majjhattapuggalo ca veripuggalo cāti catasso sīmā.
anya-e0401n8:6_30: sabbepurisātiādinā odhiso paricchedato pharaṇaṁ odhisopharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_33: sabbebhūtātiādinā anodhiso aparicchedato pharaṇaṁ anodhisopharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_34: Puratthimāyadisāya sabbesattā averāhontūtiādinā disāvibhāgavasena pharaṇaṁ disāpharaṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:6_35: ‘‘Taṁ samaṅgīno cā’’ti tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā.
anya-e0401n8:6_37: Brahmasaddo vā seṭṭhapariyāyo ‘brahmaṁ puññaṁ pasavatī’tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0401n8:6_47: Catubbidhopi hi āhāro bhājanesu vā hatthamukhādīsu vā yattha yattha sammakkheti, laggati, limpati.
anya-e0401n8:6_50: Āsayato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa ajjhoharīyamānassa kaṇṭhādīsu ṭhitehi pittasemhādīhi āsayehi sammissanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_53: Pakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa nidhānagatassa paripakkakāle gūthamuttādibhāvapattito paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_54: Apakkato paṭikūlatā nāma tasmiṁ aparipakke ajiṇṇe sati sarīre nānāroguppattivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_55: Phalato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa paripakkakālato paṭṭhāya sarīre kesalomādīnaṁ paṭikūlarāsīnaṁ vaḍḍhanavasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_56: Nissandato paṭikūlatā nāma tassa na vahidvārehi vā lomakūpehivā aññehi nānāvaṇamukhehi vā uggharaṇa paggharaṇādivasena paṭikūlatā.
anya-e0401n8:6_58: ‘‘Nikantippahānasaññā’’ti kantāramagge mātāpitūnaṁ kantāranittaraṇatthāya putta maṁsakhādane viya ati
anya-e0401n8:6_59: manuññepi āhāre rasataṇhā pahānavasena pavattā saññā.
anya-e0401n8:6_63: Tattha karaṇatthetāva ‘‘rāgena caratī’’ti catūsu iriyāpathesu yebhūyyena rāgacittena carati.
anya-e0401n8:6_65: Itthambhūta lakkhaṇe pana ‘‘rāgena caratī’’ti tesu rāgaketu rāgadhajo hutvā vicaratīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:6_71: Muditā bhāvetabbā aratiyā pahānāyāti imaṁ pāḷisesaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:6_74: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ aratiyā yadidaṁ muditā ceto vimuttīti evaṁ nissaraṇa bhāvavacanato ca.
anya-e0401n8:6_77: ‘‘Dosa vatthuttābhāvato cā’’ti dosuppattiyā vatthu bhāvassakaraṇa bhāvassa abhāvato ca.
anya-e0401n8:6_78: Nīlādīni cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_79: Kasmāpanettha dosa caritassa upekkhā sappāyakāraṇaṁ visuṁ na vuttanti.
anya-e0401n8:6_86: Visuddhi magge pana evaṁ vuttaṁ natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:6_90: Buddhivisayabhūtāni maraṇa upasamasaññā vavatthānānipi mohacaritassa sappāyāni siyunti vuttaṁ ‘‘evañhisatī’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_93: Evaṁsati vaṇṇakasiṇānaṁ puthulakhuddakatāpi ettha saṅgahitā hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:6_98: Atha buddhicaritassa pana asappāyaṁ nāma natthīti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjheyyāti iminā adhippāyena ‘‘khuddakanti padeyujjatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Athavā,
anya-e0401n8:6_102: buddhicaritādīnaṁ pana puthulaṁpi khuddakaṁpi anuññātaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:6_105: Vitakka carite ca atisappāyatāya saddhābuddhi caritesūti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_1: Guṇānaṁ’’ti ettha guṇasaddo pubbapadesu yojetabbo buddhaguṇānañca dhammaguṇānañcātiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:7_7: Saṁvejaniyo dhammo yassāti saṁvejaniya dhammaṁ. Maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_14: Na te kadāci somanassena vinā appanaṁ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_15: Byāpādavihiṁsā aratīnaṁ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā pañcamajjhāne viya sukhasomanassānañca avikkhambhanato.
anya-e0401n8:7_19: Nimittaṁ daḷhavibhūtaṁ katvā gahaṇaṁ daḷha vibhūtaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_21: ‘‘Paṭibhāganimittaṁ’’ti ettha paṭibhāgasaddo tassa dise pavattoti āha ‘‘tādise’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_22: ‘‘Taṁsaṇṭhāne’’ti etena pathavimaṇḍalādīsu viya saṇṭhānākārena ṭhitesu sabhāva dhamma puñjesu eva tassadisaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_26: ‘‘Uggahakosallaṁ’’ti bhāvanākammaṁ ārabhitukāmena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santike sabbassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānassa uggahaṇaṁ uggaho.
anya-e0401n8:7_29: Sabbaṁ uggahituṁ asakkontena yaṁ attanā ārabhissati.
anya-e0401n8:7_32: ‘‘Gahaṇaṁ’’ti ca yathā citte avinassamānaṁ hutvā labbhati,
anya-e0401n8:7_33: tathā katvā cittena gahaṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘uparūparī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_36: Tasmiṁ nimittaggahaṇakamme yaṁ yaṁ kattabbavidhānaṁ atthi,
anya-e0401n8:7_37: taṁ taṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā gahaṇanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_40: Uggaha nimitte saṇṭhānaṁ gaṇhantopi vaṇṇarūpādinā sabhāva dhammena saheva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_41: Paṭibhāganimitte pana sabhāvadhammaṁ muñcitvā tassa disaṁ nimitta paññatti saṅkhātaṁ suddhasaṇṭhānameva gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_43: paṭibhāganimittepi vaṇṇo nāma sandissati yevāti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_48: ‘‘Pavesitaṁ’’ti bhāvanācittassa abbhantare pakkhittaṁ viya hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_56: ‘‘Nimittarakkhaṇavidhānaṁ’’ti samuppannassa nimittassa anassanatthāya sattavidhehi palibodha dhammehi rakkhaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_59: Visuddhi magge eva te vuttāti dassetuṁ gāthamāha.
anya-e0401n8:7_86: ‘‘Vitakkādikaṁ oḷārikaṅgaṁ pahānāyā’’ti ettha kassa balena pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_87: Taṁ taṁ virāga bhāvanā balena pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_88: Kāca taṁ taṁ virāgabhāvanā nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n8:7_89: Ajjhāsaya visesa pariggahitā upacārabhāvanā evāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘pathamajjhānaṁ tāvā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_90: ‘‘Ātāpavīriyaṁ’’ti yenavīriyena yogino attānaṁ vā kilesa dhamme vā ātāpenti paritāpenti.
anya-e0401n8:7_93: Taṁ ārabbha uparijhānantaruppattiyā bhāvanaṁ karontassapi punappunaṁ tameva pañcamajjhānaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:7_94: Ārammaṇe ca anatikkante jhānaṁpi anatikkantameva hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:7_102: upacāro ca sampajjatīti yojanā tikkhapaññānaṁ pana puthujjanānaṁpi sataṁ buddhaguṇādīsupi upacāra sambhavo aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttoyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_105: Pubbedānaṁ datvā iminā puññena āyatiṁ jhānābhiññāyo vā maggaphalāni vā paṭilabhissāmīti patthanaṁ katvā āgatopi katādhikāro evātipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_108: navavidhesu pañcakanayavasena vuttoti tesaṁ vādīnaṁ sādhakavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_110: Ākāsa kasiṇena vinā arūpajjhānāni labhitvā puna abhiññatthāya parikammekate ākāsakasiṇepi kattabbattā
anya-e0401n8:7_111: tassa abhiññāpādakatā sambhavo vuttoti atthassa sambhavato.
anya-e0401n8:7_112: Pubbe abhāvita bhāvanoti ca akatādhikāroti ca atthato ekaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_114: ‘‘Tādisānaṁ’’ti pubbe akatādhikārānaṁ abhāvitabhāvanānaṁ idāni iddhivikubbanaṁ karissāmīti ārabhantānaṁ
anya-e0401n8:7_117: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ savanaṁ karissāmītiādikaṁpi gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_119: Abhiññāsu vasipattānampi taṁ pañcamajjhānaṁ chasuārammaṇesu yathārahaṁ appetiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_120: ‘‘Adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ’’ti yathicchita nipphattatthāya sataṁ hotu sahassaṁ hotūtiādinā cittena abhividhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_123: sahassaṁ homīti vā’’ti attānaṁ sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā nimminanavasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_132: Duvidhaṁhi adhiṭṭhānaṁ parikammena adhiṭṭhānaṁ abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0401n8:7_139: ‘‘Sesābhiññāsupi yathārahaṁ vattabbo’’ti dibbasotaparikamme tenevaparikamma samādhiññāṇasotena āsanne dibbavisayaṁpi saddaṁ suṇātītiādinā vattabbo.
anya-e0401n8:7_142: ‘‘Idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ’’ti therassa matena daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:7_143: Idha pana ādikammikavidhānappadhānattā pacchimaṁpi pādakajjhāna samāpajjanaṁ vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0401n8:7_144: ‘‘Kāyagatikaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā’’ti ayaṁ kāyo viya idaṁ cittaṁpi dandhagamanaṁ hotūti evaṁ cittaṁ kāyagatikaṁ karaṇena adhiṭṭhahitvā.
anya-e0401n8:7_145: ‘‘Dissamānena kāyenā’’ti dandhagamanena gacchantattā bahujanānampi dissamānena rūpakāyena.
anya-e0401n8:7_149: Itaraṁ pana hadaya vatthurūpaṁ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_150: Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṁ vicāraṇā atthīti taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ tāvā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:7_159: ‘‘Itarathā’’ti aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati.
anya-e0401n8:7_170: Atīte parinibbutānaṁ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṁ ārammaṇabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁpi anussaratiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:7_171: Tattha tesaṁ maggaphalānaṁ atītattā nibbānaṁpi pubbenivutthaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:8_0: ‘‘Yaṁ yaṁ adhiṭṭhātī’’ti yaṁ yaṁ satādikaṁ saṁvidhāti.
anya-e0401n8:8_1: ‘‘Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī’’ti yena yena āvibhāvādikena pakārena saṁvidhāti.
anya-e0401n8:8_5: ‘‘Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ’’ti ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṁ sampaṭicchana samatthaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_12: Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_14: Imasmiṁ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṁpi ārammaṇaṁ pakatiñāṇassa visayoti katvā ‘‘dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:8_16: ‘‘Yathā cetaṁ’’ti yathā ca etaṁ imasmiṁ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti.
anya-e0401n8:10_4: Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:10_8: ‘‘Sukhanimittaṁ’’ti khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabheda dukkhānaṁ abhāvato sukhito niddukkho nibbhayotiādinā sukhākārasaṇṭhitaṁ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n8:10_10: ṭhātuṁ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṁ sattanimittameva.
anya-e0401n8:11_3: Tattha niccasīlameva uparijhānādivisesānaṁ adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṁ ‘‘niccasīlamevā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:11_15: ‘‘Soḷasavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ’’ti ahosiṁ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṁ soḷasavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_16: ‘‘Aṭṭhavidhaṁ vā kaṅkhaṁ’’ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme āgataṁ aṭṭhavidhaṁ vicikicchaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_17: Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṁ uppattiyā akāraṇameva kāraṇaṁ katvā gahaṇadiṭṭhi.
anya-e0401n8:11_27: ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha ‘‘etthacā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_29: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṁ sutamayaññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:11_30: Atthaṁ ñatvā atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṁ ñāṇaṁ cintāmayaññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:11_34: Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṁ katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:11_37: Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṁ bhāvanā kammaṁ nāma tattha icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:12_2: Aniccānaṁ vā saṅkhata dhammānaṁ lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n8:12_3: ‘‘Abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanākāro’’ti yathā sīghasotāyaṁ nadiyaṁ nāvāya uddhaṁ gacchantaṁ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:12_7: Evamevaṁ sīghasote saṁsāre attabhāvena uddhaṁ khaṇato khaṇaṁ divasato divasaṁ gacchantaṁ puggalaṁ ayaṁ
anya-e0401n8:12_8: attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṁ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:12_15: Ettha ca saṁsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṁ nāma rūpadhammānaṁ pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:12_16: Ettha ca maraṇaṁ duvidhaṁ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha maraṇañca.
anya-e0401n8:12_17: Tattha sammuti maraṇaṁ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:12_19: Paramattha maraṇaṁ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṁ nāmarūpa dhammānaṁ maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:12_23: Imasmiṁ vipassanā kamme idaṁ paramattha maraṇaṁ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:12_24: Dhammānaṁ susānakkhettanti ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti.
anya-e0401n8:12_25: Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya santānaṁ anubandhatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:12_26: Anubandhattā ca sattānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma samayo natthi,
anya-e0401n8:12_29: Tesaṁ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca sambādhapattito.
anya-e0401n8:12_30: Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccanubhavantānaṁ pākaṭoyeva.
anya-e0401n8:12_34: Lokasmiñhi sabbaṁpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṁ nāma antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṁ upādāya dhammānaṁ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
anya-e0401n8:13_6: Vipassanā kammaṁ patvā khaṇikavasena ekekadhammavibhāgavasena ca anupassanā kiccaṁ natthīti āha ‘‘samūha santativasena panā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:13_7: Ekekadhammavibhāgavasena anupassanāpi pana pakatiyā supākaṭesu cittavedanādīsu icchitabbāyeva.
anya-e0401n8:13_8: ‘‘Aniccatāya paramākoṭī’’ti tato uttari aniccatā nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:13_9: Dhammānaṁ tathā tathā bhāyitabbappakāro nāma pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato,
anya-e0401n8:13_12: Etena apāyadukkha saṁsāra dukkhabhīrukehi janehi bhāyitabbanti bhayaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_14: Bhayassa samanu passanāñāṇaṁ bhayañāṇanti imamatthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n8:13_20: ‘‘Cattālīsāya ākārehī’’ti pañcakkhandhe ‘aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato, ābādhato, parato, palokato, ītito,.
anya-e0401n8:13_43: passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhatīti evaṁ mahāniddese moghapañhaniddese āgatehi cattālīsāya ākārehi.
anya-e0401n8:13_46: Sabbepi pañcakkhandhā aniccā evāti passantoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:13_47: Kathaṁ pana aniccato passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhatīti.
anya-e0401n8:13_48: Niccaguṇa suññatāya suññato pañcakkhandhabhūtaṁ lokaṁ avekkhati.
anya-e0401n8:13_50: Tattha ‘‘aniccā evā’’ti paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yadākadāci maraṇa dhammattā aniccā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_56: Yehi keci loke cakkhu rogādikā anekasahassā rogā nāma sandissanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_59: Tasmā te ekantena rogajātikā evāti. Api ca,
anya-e0401n8:13_60: dukkhasacca dhammattātīhi dukkhatāhi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi ca abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanato rujjanaṭṭhena rogā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_61: Tattha ‘‘tīhi dukkhatāhī’’ti dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāra dukkhatā vipariṇāma dukkhatāti imāhi tīhidukkhatāhi.
anya-e0401n8:13_69: Sallaṁ nāma vijjhanaṭṭhena kilesa sallañca dukkhasallañca.
anya-e0401n8:13_71: Ime ca khandhā vipattipariyosānattā niratthakā eva honti.
anya-e0401n8:13_76: eso me attāti evaṁ vissāsaṁ arahanti.
anya-e0401n8:13_77: Tathā vissāsaṁ karontassa nānādukkhehi niccaṁ vihiṁsanato.
anya-e0401n8:13_78: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yadākadāci palujjanadhammattā palokadhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_80: Khandhā antarāya jātikā evāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:13_81: Ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā dutattā vibādhakattā upaddavā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_83: Anattā eva samānā ajjhattabhāvaṁ upagantvā sajjanato lagganato dummo cayato upasaggā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_87: Jarāmaraṇādito apāyavinipatanādito bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_88: Te ca khandhā kassacitāṇā na honti.
anya-e0401n8:13_91: Bhayato bhīrukā janā līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:13_99: Niccatādīhi sabbehi sobhaṇaguṇehi sabbaso rahitattā tucchattā suññattārittā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_102: Attā vuccati yassakassaci koci sārabhūto paṭissaraṇo.
anya-e0401n8:13_106: Aniccatādīhi ādīnavehi dosehi sampuṇṇattā ādīnavā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_110: Te sayaṁ maraṇa dhammasamaṅgīno hutvā tena maraṇasatthena maraṇāvudhena saṁsāre sattānaṁ niccaṁ mārakattā jīvitindriyupacchedakattā vadhakā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_115: Anicchantasseva sato cakkhurogādibhāvena apāyabhavādibhāvena jātasabhāvattā jātidhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_116: Anicchantasseva sato hāyanamaraṇasabhāvattā jarāmaraṇa dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_117: Sokādīnaṁ vatthubhāvena dhāraṇattā sokādi dhammā eva.
anya-e0401n8:13_118: Taṇhā saṁkilesa diṭṭhisaṁkilesa duccarita saṁkilesehi niyuttattā saṁkilesika dhammā evāti.
anya-e0401n8:14_0: Loke attajīvā nāma sattānaṁ ajjhatta dhammesu sāradhammā honti.
anya-e0401n8:14_1: Tesu vigatesu sesadhammā nissatta nijjīvabhāvaṁ patvā pheggubhūtā kacavarabhūtāti lokassa abhimāno.
anya-e0401n8:14_2: Te ca attajīvā nāma sabbaso natthīti diṭṭhe khandhesu kacavarabhāvadassanaṁ attajīva suññatā dassanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_5: ‘‘Nimittānī’’ti vipallāsadhammehi nimmitāni niccanimitta sukhanimitta attanimitta jīvanimittāni.
anya-e0401n8:14_6: Satta puggala itthi purisa hattha pāda sīsa gīvādīni nimittāni ca.
anya-e0401n8:14_7: Tattha saṅkhārānaṁ khaṇika dhammattā aniccānaṁyeva sataṁ santati ghanena paṭicchannattā hiyyopi so eva,
anya-e0401n8:14_8: ajjapi so evātiādinā niccākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ niccanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_9: Kilesamalehi pariggahitattā asubhānaṁyeva sataṁ avijjāya paṭicchannattā idaṁ iṭṭhaṁ, kantaṁ, manāpaṁ, piyarūpa,
anya-e0401n8:14_11: Bhayaṭṭhena akhemaṭṭhena dukkhānaṁpi sataṁ tāyeva paṭicchannattā idaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e0401n8:14_14: Paccayā yattavuttikattā paccayena vinā kevalaṁ attano vasāyattavuttitā bhāvato anattānaṁyeva sataṁ attano icchāvasena karoti, katheti, cinteti,
anya-e0401n8:14_20: saṁvaccharaṁpi jīvatītiādinā jīvākārena upaṭṭhānaṁ jīvanimittaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:14_21: Nanu cettha attano icchāvasena karotītiādīsu icchānāma taṇhāvāchando vā.
anya-e0401n8:14_24: Evañcasati tesaṁ cittavasena pavattattā attano icchāvasena karotīti idaṁ abhidhammaviruddhaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:14_31: Idha pana tasmiṁ samaye pavattaṁ khandhapañcakameva attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:14_34: Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena vinicchayaṁ pāpetvāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:15_0: ‘‘Taṁ taṁ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā’’ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṁ bhindana chindanavasena.
anya-e0401n8:15_3: Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:15_4: Maggakkhaṇaṁ patvā eva tadubhayaṁpi sabbaso samucchindatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:16_16: iriyā patha sannissitañcāti imehi tividhehi kuhanavatthūhi.
anya-e0401n8:16_25: Taṁ taṁ payojana mariyādo nāma cīvarapaccaye tāva sītappaṭighātādiko payojanamariyādo.
anya-e0401n8:16_26: ‘‘Mariyādo’’ti ca yāvadevāti padena dassito sītappaṭighātādiko cīvarappayojana paricchedo.
anya-e0401n8:16_27: So ca cīvarapaccaye sammohādike sāvajjapakkhe apatanatthāya ṭhapito.
anya-e0401n8:16_28: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassa pahānatthaṁ’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:16_31: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṁ paṭisevati yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyātiādīsu yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya paṭisevati.
anya-e0401n8:16_32: Na tato uttari sammohatthāya gedhatthāya madatthāya pamādatthāya paṭisevatītiādi.
anya-e0401n8:17_5: Pajjati gacchati pavattati phalaṁ etenāti padaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:17_10: Diṭṭhivippayuttā pana saññā citta vipallāsā vikkhambhituṁ sakkotīti na vattabbā.
anya-e0401n8:17_11: ‘‘Sāsana dhamme’’ti anattalakkhaṇa suttantādike suññata dhammappaṭisaṁyutte desanādhamme.
anya-e0401n8:17_12: ‘‘Diṭṭhivipallāso vikkhambhito’’ti tādisaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā desake satthari ca desite dhamme ca saddhaṁ paṭilabhitvā saccameva bhagavā āha,
anya-e0401n8:17_17: Tato paṭṭhāya eso me attāti vadantopi diṭṭhisampayuttacittena na vadati.
anya-e0401n8:17_21: Taṁ pana dhammavavatthānaññāṇe siddhe eva sijjhatītipi vadanti.
anya-e0401n8:17_22: Catunnaṁ āhārānaṁ vasena catudhā nāmarūpaṁ pariggahetabbameva. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:17_23: cattāro āhāre pariggahetvā tesveva lakkhaṇattayaṁ samanupassantassa ante lokuttaraññāṇadassanappaṭilābhakiccassa siddhattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:17_26: visuṁ visuṁ lakkhaṇa rasādīhi pariggahetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā.
anya-e0401n8:17_27: Pariggahaṇe sakkontassapi vipassanā kamme visuṁ visuṁ passituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā ca.
anya-e0401n8:17_34: Suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā īhābyāpārānaṁ abhāvadassanatoti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:17_38: tiādi vohārassa sabbhāvato tassa atthabhūto sattapuggalādikopi sabhāvato atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:17_39: No natthīti evaṁ daḷhaṁ hadaye sannidhānakaraṇa vasena.
anya-e0401n8:17_40: ‘‘Atidhāvanañcā’’ti vohāra paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā taṁ atikkamitvā pañcakkhandhe sattādibhāvena gahaṇañcāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:18_9: Ekassa sattassa anamatagge saṁsāre saṁsarantassa rūpakāyopi atthi nāmakāyopi atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_11: Dve ca kāyā pañcavokāre saṁsarantassa ekato pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_13: So eva tattha ekosattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:18_14: Arūpe saṁsarantassa nāma kāyo eva pavattati.
anya-e0401n8:18_15: So eva tattha eko sattoti saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:18_17: Tesu ca kāyesu rūpakāye cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ anantara paccayatā nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_18: Ekamekasmiṁ bhave ekameko hutvā cutikāle bhijjati.
anya-e0401n8:18_20: Paṭisandhirūpena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho nappavattati.
anya-e0401n8:18_21: Nāma kāye pana cuti paṭisandhīnaṁ aññamaññaṁ anantarapaccayatā atthi.
anya-e0401n8:18_23: Paṭisandhi nāmena saha paccaya paccayuppannatā pabandho pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_24: Tattha paṭiccasamuppāda kusalo bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppādaññāṇe ṭhatvā ekasmiṁbhave ekassa sattassa pavattiṁ passanto sattaṁ nāma na passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_28: Ahaṁ atītesu bhavesu ahosintipi na passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_31: Atha kho avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā pavattanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_32: Saṅkhāra paccayā bhavantare viññāṇaṁ pavattatītiādinā nayena nāmarūpa dhammānaṁ hetuphala paramparāvasena avicchedappavattimeva passati.
anya-e0401n8:18_34: anamataggesaṁsāre anantesu bhavesu tassa sattassa pavatti diṭṭhā eva hoti tatthapi evameva,
anya-e0401n8:18_36: Tadā tassa soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahīyatīti imamatthaṁ ‘‘dassento anamatagge saṁsāre’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:18_42: Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānanti evaṁ pubbante pañcavidhā kaṅkhāvuttā.
anya-e0401n8:18_47: Kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānanti evaṁ aparante pañcavidhā kaṅkhā vuttā .
anya-e0401n8:18_52: Ahaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato.
anya-e0401n8:18_53: So kuhiṁ gāmī bhavissāmīti evaṁ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:18_56: na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_61: Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṁjāto ahosinti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_69: Atha tesu apādakādīsu aññataro ahaṁ ahosiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_71: Pathamabhave kiṁ hutvā dutīya bhavādīsu kiṁ ahosinti idaṁ bhavaparamparāvasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_74: no nu kho smī’’ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.
anya-e0401n8:18_78: ‘‘Sītasmī’’ti ahaṁ ucchinnovā bhavāmīti attho. Yathā ca.
anya-e0401n8:18_85: Tathā idhāpi ahaṁ nu kho smi.
anya-e0401n8:18_87: Tattha ‘‘ahaṁ nu khosmī’’ti ayaṁ ahaṁ nāma bhavābhavesu niccakālaṁ asmi nu kho,
anya-e0401n8:18_88: mama attānāma sassato hutvā sabbakālaṁ atthi nu khoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_89: ‘‘No nu kho smī’’ti tathā no asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_90: Mama attā tathā natthi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_91: Ettha ca ‘‘bhavābhavesū’’ti pavattepi paccuppanne vattamānaṁ attānaṁ gahetvā pavattā paccuppanne saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_92: ‘‘Kiṁ nu kho smī’’ti ahaṁ nāma santo jāto kiṁ nu kho asmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_93: Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā asmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_94: Kenaci iddhimantena vā nimmito bhavāmi nu kho.
anya-e0401n8:18_95: Udāhu ahetu apaccayā vā kenaci animmito vā sayaṁ nu kho bhavāmi nu khoti attho.
anya-e0401n8:18_96: ‘‘Kathaṁ nu kho smī’’ti ettha pana apadādīhi ayojetvā ahaṁ nu kho kiṁ gotto bhavāmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_97: Gotamagotto vā vāseṭṭha gotto vā tiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:18_98: Ādi kappakāle tāni gottāni etarahi sambhedaṁ gacchanti.
anya-e0401n8:18_100: ‘‘Ahaṁ kuto āgato’’ti ahaṁ atīte kutobhavato āgato asmi.
anya-e0401n8:18_101: ‘‘Sokuhiṁgāmī bhavissāmī’’ti so ahaṁ āyatiṁ bhave kuhiṁ gāmiko bhavissāmīti kaṅkhati.
anya-e0401n8:18_102: ‘‘Kaṅkhāya atikkamo’’ti so bhikkhu paṭiccasamuppāde avijjādikaṁ atītahetu pañcakaṁ passanto tasmiṁbhave sabbaṁpi paṭiccasamuppādaṁ passatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_103: Evaṁ passanto na tattha ahaṁ nāma koci atthi,
anya-e0401n8:18_104: yaṁ paṭicca atīta visayā pañcavidhā kaṅkhā uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:18_105: Dhamma mattameva tattha atthīti evaṁ atīte kaṅkhā vatthussa abhāvadassanena pañcavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamo hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_106: Nanu tathā passantassapi kathaṁ nu kho smi,
anya-e0401n8:18_107: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu khoti ayaṁ kaṅkhā atthiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_108: Tathā passantopi hi vinā pubbenivāsaññāṇena atīte bhave ahaṁ dvipādako ahosintivā catuppādako ahosinti
anya-e0401n8:18_109: vā tato cuto asukabhave uppannoti vā na jānāti na passatīti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n8:18_110: Sā pana kaṅkhā dhamma mattappavatti dassanato paṭṭhāya antarāyika kaṅkhā na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:18_113: Tathā anāgate phalapañcakaṁ passanto aparante pañcavidhaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_114: Paccuppanne phalapañcakañca hetupañcakañca passanto paccuppanne kaṅkhā chakkaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_116: Aṭṭhavidhāya kaṅkhāya atikkamane pana paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomappaṭilomaṁ passanto desanā dhamme ca lokuttara dhammesu ca kaṅkhaṁ atikkamati.
anya-e0401n8:18_117: Dhamme kaṅkhātikkamanena saheva desente satthari ca,
anya-e0401n8:18_123: paṭiccasamuppādena saha paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ca sabbaṁ kaṅkhaṁ atikkamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:18_125: Tattha ‘‘sabhāvadhammappavattiyā cā’’ti paccayaparamparāvasena sabhāvadhammānaṁ paramparappavattiyā ca.
anya-e0401n8:18_126: Dhammasu dhammatā nāma desanā dhammassa svākkhātatādibhāvena sundara dhammatā.
anya-e0401n8:18_128: Buddhasubuddhatā nāma taṁ dhammaṁ desentassa buddhassa sabbaññubuddhatā.
anya-e0401n8:19_0: Pariyuṭṭhitānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ nāma heṭṭhā dhammavavatthāna vasena paccayapariggahavasena ca sijjhati.
anya-e0401n8:19_1: Vipassanā kammaṁ pana anusayabhūtānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ sallikhanatthāya karīyatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘anusaya samūhananatthañcā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:19_5: ‘‘Yaṁ dūre santikevā’’ti yaṁ dūre pavattaṁ rūpaṁ vā,
anya-e0401n8:19_8: ‘‘Ñāṇena daḷhaṁ gahetvā’’ti dhammavavatthānaññāṇena suṭṭhuvibhūtaṁ katvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:19_11: Puna daḷhaṁ gahitassa rūpassa aniccalakkhaṇaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sā ca kriyā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_17: Visuṁ visunti vuttattā tāsaṁ aññamaññañca sahajātesu gahaṇaṁ sambhavatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘āpādīnaṁ’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:19_20: ‘‘Tathā tathā kappetvā’’ti rūpadhammānaṁ santati parivatti nāma abhikkamantassa evaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n8:19_23: ‘‘Sesakhandhesupi taṁ taṁ santati nānattaṁ’’ti vedanākkhandhe tāva kāye kāyikasukhasantati dukkhasantatīnaṁ nānattaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_27: Yadā citte somanassa domanassāni na sandissanti,
anya-e0401n8:19_28: tadā idāni upekkhā me vedanā pavattatīti vā,
anya-e0401n8:19_30: tadā sā nirujjhatīti vā evaṁ takketvā sammasitabbāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_36: kusalā kusalaviññāṇādīnañca vasena santati nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_37: Vissāsaṁ karotīti vatvā tadatthaṁ vivarati ‘‘etaṁ me’’tiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:19_51: Vase sabbaso vattanto nāma kevalaṁ vasāyattavuttiko eva siyā,
anya-e0401n8:19_54: ‘‘Tathāpariggahetabbo’’ti eso me attāti evaṁ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahetabbo.
anya-e0401n8:19_55: Tathā hi yo attano vasena vattati,
anya-e0401n8:19_58: tasmiṁ rūpādike dhamme attānaṁ sāmikaṁ katvā eso mama attāti pariggaho nāma micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_59: Tathā yo ca khaṇika dhammo hoti,
anya-e0401n8:19_61: taṁ rūpādikaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ attano sāraṁ katvā tathā pariggahopi micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_62: Ettha ca ‘‘micchā evā’’ti paramattha saccaṁ patvā micchā eva.
anya-e0401n8:19_64: ‘‘Sukhaṁ viddhaṁsetī’’ti kāyikasukhañca cetasika sukhañca viddhaṁseti. Vināseti.
anya-e0401n8:19_65: ‘‘Nānādukkhaṁ janetī’’ti kāyikadukkhañca cetasika dukkhañca janeti uppādeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_67: Manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ sattānaṁ yathāpavattaṁ manussa sukhaṁ viddhaṁseti,
anya-e0401n8:19_70: Sayaṁ apāyattabhāvaṁ gahetvā tesaṁ nānāapāya dukkhaṁ janeti.
anya-e0401n8:19_71: Tathā devattabhāve sakkattabhāve brahmattabhāve ṭhitānantiādinā vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_72: Tathā manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṁ nānāvipariṇāma kiccehi yathāpavattaṁ sukhaṁ viddhaṁseti,
anya-e0401n8:19_75: ‘‘Sāronāma thāmabalaviseso vuccatī’’ti etena thāmabalavisesena sampannaṁ vatthuṁpi saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:19_77: na sārakaṁ asārakanti imamatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘rūpaṁ pana sayaṁpi evarūpo sāro na hotī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_78: Sattānaṁ attasāro jīvasāro na hotīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:19_79: Natthi sāro etassāti asārakanti imamatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘na ca evarūpena sārena yuttaṁ’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_81: Tattha purimo attho rūpaṁ attato samanupassatīti idaṁ sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_84: rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁti imāni sandhāya vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_88: natthi attā etassāti vā anattāti ca dvidhā attho sijjhati.
anya-e0401n8:19_91: Etena anattabhāve siddhe dukkhabhāvopi siddhoti dasseti.
anya-e0401n8:19_92: ‘‘Tiṇṇaṁ vayānaṁ vasena addhābhedo yojetabbo’’ti pathamavaye pavattaṁ rūpaṁ dutīyavayaṁ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0401n8:19_93: pathamavaye eva nirujjhatītiādinā addhāpaccuppanne antogadhabhedo yojetabbo.
anya-e0401n8:19_94: ‘‘Sabhāgekasantānavasenā’’ti sabhāgānaṁ dhammānaṁ sabhāgaṭṭhena ekībhūtā santati sabhāgekasantati.
anya-e0401n8:19_95: ‘‘Sabhāgānaṁ dhammānaṁ’’ti ca cittajesutāva nirantarappavattena lobhasampayuttacittena sahajātā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpadhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:19_98: Utujesu nirantarappavattena sītautunā samuṭṭhitā rūpadhammā sabhāgarūpa dhammā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:19_103: Evañca katvā heṭṭhā aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti pade catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ santati vibhāganayo suṭṭhu dassitoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_104: ‘‘Aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ’’ti imasmiṁ ñāṇepi udayabbayaññāṇepi bhaṅgaññāṇepi aniccalakkhaṇa dassanameva padhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_105: Bhayaññāṇe ca ādīnavaññāṇe ca nibbidāñāṇe ca dukkhalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_106: Upari catūsu ñāṇesu anattalakkhaṇa dassanaṁ padhānanti.
anya-e0401n8:19_111: Appahīna vasenāti pāḷipade pana avijjā taṇhā diṭṭhānusayānaṁ appahīnaṭṭhena santāne vijjamānatā eva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_121: Tasmiṁ bhave nirodho nāma bhavantare puna anuppādo yevāti vuttaṁ ‘‘bhavantare’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n8:19_122: ‘‘Taṁ santatiyaṁ’’ti tasmiṁ paccuppanna bhaveti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:19_123: ‘‘Puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṁ nirodhaṁ’’ti santati nirodho nāma vutto.
anya-e0401n8:19_127: Idāni yathāpavatta santatīsu pariyāpannānaṁ sabbapacchimānaṁ nāmarūpānaṁ khaṇikanirodhavasena atthaṁ
anya-e0401n8:19_128: vadanto ‘‘yathāpavatta santatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjantī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_129: ‘‘Udayabbayaṁ samanupassantassa cā’’ti ettha katamo udayo nāma,
anya-e0401n8:19_131: kathañca tadubhayaṁ samanupassatīti āha ‘‘udayabbayaṁ passantassāti ettha yathā nāmā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:19_134: Antara dhāyati .‘‘Udayo’’ti uppādo ceva vaḍḍhi ca.
anya-e0401n8:20_0: Bojjhaṅga dhammehi sampannattā ārādheti attano cittaṁti āraddho.
anya-e0401n8:20_4: Duvidhohi vipassako taruṇa vipassako ca āraddha vipassako ca.
anya-e0401n8:20_5: Tattha khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu apassanto dubbalavipassako taruṇa vipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n8:20_6: Khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ suṭṭhu passanto vipassanā kamme ārādhita citto balavavipassako āraddhavipassako nāma.
anya-e0401n8:23_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, samma dhammaṁ vipassato,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:26_0: Ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo, passato udayabbayaṁ,ti ca.
anya-e0401n8:27_3: Paribandhanti nīvārentīti paribandhakāti heṭṭhā vuttameva antarāyika dhammānaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_11: Vipassanā kamme okappanākārappavattā saddhāeva adhimuccanaṭṭhena adhimokkho saddhādhimokkho.
anya-e0401n8:27_17: ‘‘Tatramajjhattupekkhā’’ti cittassa līnuddhaccādīhi visamantehi vimuttā tatramajjhattatāsaṅkhātā upekkhā.
anya-e0401n8:27_21: ‘‘Sukhumā taṇhā’’ti kusalehi missakattā idaṁ akusalantipi jānituṁ asakkuṇeyyā sukhumataṇhā.
anya-e0401n8:27_32: na ciraṁ pavattituṁ dassāmīti imamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:27_35: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ nikanti vikkhambhanassa visuṁ vuttattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:27_36: Vipassanāparipāko nāma visesantarappavattena pākaṭoti dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṁ pattā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n8:27_42: Yadi evaṁ gotrabhupi vuṭṭhānaṁ nāma siyāti. Na siyā.
anya-e0401n8:27_46: ‘‘Taṁ samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā’’ti tena maggena samaṅgīpuggalaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:27_48: aṭṭhama bhavato paṭṭhāya kāmasugati vaṭṭappavattato vā.
anya-e0401n8:27_49: Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gameti sampāpetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:27_50: ‘‘Avassaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchantī’’ti idha ṭhitānaṁ vuṭṭhānato nivatti nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:27_52: Sabbaññu bodhisattā pana pubbabuddhānaṁ sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanā kammaṁ ārabhantā anulomaññāṇaṁ āhacca ṭhapentīti aṭṭhaka thāsu vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_53: Tattha ‘‘āhaccā’’ti idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa matthakapattidassanatthaṁ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_54: ‘‘Āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ’’ti tato pubbabhāge kenaci cittena aggahite nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_57: Gottaṁ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:27_58: Kathaṁ pana gotrabhu cittaṁ gotrabhuññāṇaṁ puthujjanagottaṁ chindati,
anya-e0401n8:27_61: Attani pana chinnattā sayaṁ chindati nāma.
anya-e0401n8:27_62: Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṁ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena ariyagottaṁ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_68: Na te dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_69: Kathaṁ te dhamme ārammaṇaṁ akaronto maggo te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti.
anya-e0401n8:27_71: So hi sammohaṁ pajahanto ārammaṇaṁ karontānipi hi pubbabhāgaññāṇāni tappahānakiccassa asādhakattā dukkha saccaṁ parijānantānīti na vuccanti.
anya-e0401n8:27_72: Maggo pana ārammaṇaṁ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṁ saccaṁ parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n8:27_73: Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṁ tasmiṁsacce parijānana kiccassa siddhattā.
anya-e0401n8:27_74: Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā andho hoti.
anya-e0401n8:27_76: Yadā pana so ekaṁ tejavantaṁ añjanaṁ labhitvā cakkhuṁ añjayanto sabbarattiṁ niddāyati.
anya-e0401n8:27_79: Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:27_86: ‘‘Puna anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṁ’’ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna anuppādasabhāvaṁ āpajjanti,
anya-e0401n8:27_89: ‘‘Uppādanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāyā’’ti etena maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā vaḍḍhanasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāso natthīti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:27_90: Ariyamaggaṁ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi maggabhāvanā eva.
anya-e0401n8:27_91: Sā ca ariyamaggaṁ patvā matthakapattā hoti.
anya-e0401n8:27_92: Tasmā ariyamaggo eva matthakapatto bhāvanānuttaro hotīti imināpariyāyena vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāyātipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:27_95: Tassa ca tatoparaṁ dve vā tīṇi vā phalacittāni pavattantīti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:27_99: Taṁ rūpaṁ tassa pākaṭaṁ na tāva hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:27_101: ‘‘Paccavekkhanavāresū’’ti ettha pasādacakkhunā diṭṭhe pavattā anubandhaka vīthiyopi saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0401n8:28_6: ‘‘Aviruddhā hotī’’ti visuddhimaggena asamentāpi paccavekkhantānaṁ icchānurūpasambhavatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:28_9: ‘‘No laddhuṁ na vaṭṭatī’’ti aladdhuṁ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:28_10: Laddhuṁ no na vaṭṭatīti vā yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:29_2: ‘‘Kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitāya adiṭṭhattā’’ti etena eso me attā,
anya-e0401n8:29_3: na parassa attāti evaṁ attānaṁ attassa sāmikaṁ katvā gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n8:29_4: Tattha kevalasaddena paramattha saccaṁ patvā attasseva abhāvato khandhapañcakassa attanovasāyatta vuttitaṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0401n8:29_5: Sammuti saccaṁ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attano vasāyatta vuttiṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_6: ‘‘Khaṇabhaṅgassa ca adiṭṭhattā’’ti etena eso me sāraṭṭhena attā.
anya-e0401n8:29_9: Yāva vassasataṁpi vassasahassampi etaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ na bhijjati,
anya-e0401n8:29_15: Ahañca mama khandhapañcakañca advayaṁ anānattanti evaṁ gahaṇakāraṇaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n8:29_16: Tattha ‘‘khaṇabhaṅgassā’’ti nāmarūpadhammānaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhañjanassa bhijjanassa maraṇassa.
anya-e0401n8:29_19: Tasmā taṁ apassanto mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṁ attanosāraṁ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0401n8:29_20: ‘‘Taṁ dvayaṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ katvā’’ti khandhapañcakassa kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca khaṇabhaṅgañca ñāṇa cakkhunā suṭṭhudiṭṭhaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n8:29_21: Tattha pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ suṭṭhupassanto kevalaṁ paccayāyatta vuttitañca avasāyatta vuttitañca suṭṭhu passati.
anya-e0401n8:29_22: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_23: So paramatthasaccaṁ patvā eso mama santakantipi vattuṁ nārahati.
anya-e0401n8:29_29: Asante ca attasmiṁ ko mama attā nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0401n8:29_32: Satto ca nāma ekasmiṁbhave ādimhi sakiṁ eva jāyati.
anya-e0401n8:29_34: Antarā vassasataṁpi vassasahassaṁpi maraṇaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_37: Evaṁsante kathaṁ khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāraṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti.
anya-e0401n8:29_38: Tasmā te avasavattanaṭṭhena asārakaṭṭhena ca anattā eva.
anya-e0401n8:29_39: Apica ‘‘avasavattanaṭṭhenā’’ti ettha vaso nāma sattasantāne eko padhānadhammo.
anya-e0401n8:29_41: So eva padhānabhūtassa vasassapi attā bhaveyya. Evaṁsati, yo vaso, so attā. Yo attā,
anya-e0401n8:29_44: rūpaṁ attāti gaṇhanto rūpañca vasañca attānañca ekattaṁ katvā gaṇhāti nāma.
anya-e0401n8:29_48: satto ca khandhapañcakañca vaso ca attā ca sabbametaṁ ekattaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0401n8:29_50: Na hi imasmiṁ vasavattanaṭṭhe ekassasattassa dve attā tayo attā bahūattāti sakkā bhavituṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_51: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati,
anya-e0401n8:29_53: Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi niccakālaṁ sattassavasaṁ anugaccheyya. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:29_54: sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa ca nānattābhāvato.
anya-e0401n8:29_60: Na hi dubbaṇṇo durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṁ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṁ surūpaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_69: Ajaraṁ vā amaraṇaṁ vā kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_71: Patitvā vā tato vimuttaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_77: Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṁ patvā khandhapañcake attano sāmikiccaṁ issarakiccaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_81: attānaṁ tassa sāmiṁ issaraṁ katvā rūpaṁ me attāti gahaṇaṁ micchāgahaṇaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:29_82: Loke pana mahājano dhammānaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ na jānanti,
anya-e0401n8:29_85: Tesaṁ parampara paccayavasena pavattamāne khandhasantāne sammuti saccavasena nānāvasavattanākārā nāma santi.
anya-e0401n8:29_87: Te sammuti saccavasena uppannesu tesu sāmiissarādhipati vohāresu vohāramatte aṭhatvā sabhāvasaccaṁ maññantā micchāgahaṇaṁ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_92: Tassa khandhapañcakaṁ tassa vasāyatta vutti eva hotīti. Na hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:29_94: Tathāhi gantuṁ icchānāma bahiddhā dhanahetuvā uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n8:29_98: yaṁ yaṁ dukkhaṁ āgaccheyya kāyikaṁ vā cetasikaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n8:29_99: Tesaṁ taṁ taṁ dukkhapaccayā dhanicchā nāma uppajjati.
anya-e0401n8:29_103: Tathā nānārammaṇānaṁ palobhana dukkhamūlikāsu ca nānāvitakkānaṁ vipphandanamūlikāsu ca icchāsu.
anya-e0401n8:29_104: Evaṁ vasopi paccayāyatta vuttiko eva hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_107: Gamanampi tena teneva uppajjati āhārupatthambhanādipaccayena ca.
anya-e0401n8:29_108: Vaso pana gamanassa paccayeka desamattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_109: So hi tadaññapaccayehi vinā sayaṁ uppajjituṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_113: idaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ paccayāyatta vuttikanticceva vattuṁ arahati.
anya-e0401n8:29_115: Api ca gantuṁ icchanto gacchatīti paññatti mattabhūto satto gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_116: Khandhapañcakaṁ pana khaṇika dhammattā na gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:29_123: Gamane ca sampajjamāne khaṇikabhijjanena doso natthīti ce. Atthi.
anya-e0401n8:29_126: gacchanto satto yadā kadāci maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhanti.
anya-e0401n8:29_128: ‘‘Vipallāsanimittaṁ’’ti ca vipallāsa dhammānaṁ vasena upaṭṭhitaṁ kicca nimittaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_131: Khandhesu suññatalakkhaṇaṁ nāma ati gambhīraṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:29_133: Suññata dassanañca diṭṭhiyā ujuppaṭipakkhanti āha ‘‘saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_134: Tattha ‘‘attha siddhi nāmā’’ti maggaphalappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa atthassa siddhi nāma.
anya-e0401n8:29_139: Atthābhiniveso ca so diṭṭhiggāho cāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n8:29_147: Unnatilakkhaṇo ca ahaṁ māno khandhesu niccadhuvavipallāsamūlako saddhāya ca paṭipakkhoti āha ‘‘aniccadassanavasenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_154: ‘‘Tiṇṇaṁ dhammānaṁ’’ti paññindriya saddhindriya samādhindriya saṅkhātānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ indriya dhammānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:29_155: ‘‘Vipassanā gamanavasene vā’’ti vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanā saṅkhātassa āgamana kāraṇassa vaseneva.
anya-e0401n8:30_0: Idāni pubbe yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘sattaariya puggalavibhāgassa paccayabhāvapattiyā cā’ti.
anya-e0401n8:30_2: Dhammānusārī nāmāti ettha ‘‘dhammo’’ti paññā vuccati ‘saccaṁ, dhammo, dhīti,
anya-e0401n8:30_5: Paññābalānusārena ādimhi maggaṁ labhatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Athavā.
anya-e0401n8:30_7: Suññatadassanañca nāma visesato suddhadhamma dassanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_11: Ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddha dassanasampannattā diṭṭhibaleneva sukhena taṁ taṁ maggaphalaṁ pattoti diṭṭhipatto.
anya-e0401n8:30_12: Teneva dassana paññābalena kilesabandhanato vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
anya-e0401n8:30_13: Saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_20: Saddhābaleneva ādimhi ariyamaggaṁ pāpuṇātīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_24: Attano kāye eva laddhaṁ sakkhaṁ yassāti kāyasakkhī.
anya-e0401n8:30_25: Dukkhānu passī puggalo hi saṁvega bahulo hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_28: Tasmā so saṁvegavasena bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjanto yaṁ yaṁ purisathāmena pattabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_30: Pāpuṇanto ca attano kāye eva sakkhaṁ labhati.
anya-e0401n8:30_31: Sandiṭṭhaṁ jhānasukhaṁ vā maggaphalasukhaṁ vā labhatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_32: ‘‘Ubhatobhāga vimutto’’ti arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato arahattamaggaphalehi nāmakāyatoti evaṁ ubhohi kāyabhāgehi vimutto.
anya-e0401n8:30_33: Ettha ca tayo ariyapuggalā paññādhiko ca saddhādhiko ca vīriyādhiko ca.
anya-e0401n8:30_34: Tattha dhammānusārī ca diṭṭhipatto ca paññāvimutto ca paññādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_35: Saddhānusārī ca saddhāvimutto ca saddhādhiko nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_36: Kāyasakkhī ca ubhatobhāgavimutto ca vīriyādhiko nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_38: Abhidhamme pana puggala paññattiyaṁ saddhāvimutto ca kāyasakkhī ca dvepuggalā sekkhesu eva vuttā.
anya-e0401n8:30_39: Arahattaṁ pattā pana ete dvepi paññāvimuttā evāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0401n8:30_41: saṅkhāra dhammānaṁ khaṇika dhammabhāve suṭṭhu saddahanaṁ aveccappasādo saddhā nāmāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_42: Kiṁ pana tādisena saddhāmattena sotāpatti maggaṁ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0401n8:30_45: Yathāha mahāvagge okkanta saṁyutte cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī,
anya-e0401n8:30_51: So yenakammena apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ uppajjeyya.
anya-e0401n8:30_56: Vipariṇāmoti ca khaṇe khaṇe jīraṇatā bhijjanatā vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_59: Sā eva sotāpattiyaṅgesu buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme,
anya-e0401n8:30_61: Tattha ñāṇasampayuttasaddhā nāma cakkhādīnaṁ aniccanimitta dassanaññāṇena sampayuttā okappanasaddhā.
anya-e0401n8:30_62: Aniccanimittañca nāma rūpaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenātipade vuttanayena cakkhādinissayānaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ santati parivattanādikaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_65: Tānipi khaṇe khaṇe ekantena bhijjati yevāti saddhādhimokkhaṁ saddhāvinicchayaṁ paṭilabhatīti attho.
anya-e0401n8:30_66: ‘‘Buddhe aveccappasādenā’’ti ettha pana arahatā sammāsambuddhatādīnaṁ buddhaguṇādīnaṁ dassanaññāṇena sampayutto pasādo aveccappasādo nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_67: Ariyabhūmi nāma diṭṭhānusaya vicikicchānusayehi parisuddhā avatthābhūmi vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:30_69: Kathaṁ pana tassa puggalassa puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkantatā ariyabhūmiṁ okkantatā ca viññāyatīti āha ‘‘so yenā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n8:30_70: Yo attano jīvitahetupi kiñci kammapathapattaṁ apāyagāmi kammaṁ na karoti.
anya-e0401n8:30_74: Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n8:30_77: Tattha ‘‘mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamatī’’ti saddhānusārīviya saddahanamatte aṭṭhatvā cakkhādīnaṁ tādisaṁ aniccataṁ
anya-e0401n8:30_78: samanupassanto thokaṁ thokaṁ dassanaṁ labhatiyeva. Evaṁsati,
anya-e0401n8:30_79: cakkhādīni tassa puggalassa nijjhānaṁ olokanaṁ mattaso khamanti nāma.
anya-e0401n8:30_81: Aparaṁpi vuttaṁ cakkhu bhikkhave aniccaṁ vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
anya-e0401n8:30_84: Tattha ‘‘pajānāti passatī’’ti dhammānusārīviya mattaso nijjhānakkhamamatte aṭṭhatvā paññāya pajānāti,
anya-e0401n8:31_0: ‘‘Yathā sakaṁ phalaṁ’’ti ettha sassa attano idaṁ sakaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:31_1: Yaṁ yaṁ sakaṁ yathāsakanti atthaṁ dasseti sotāpannassātiādinā.
anya-e0401n8:31_2: Phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṁ pana anulomajavanāni eva phalānaṁ āsannakāraṇāni,
anya-e0401n8:32_4: Idaṁpi vipassanāñāṇaṁ aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti samanupassitabbā ca hotīti.
anya-e0401n8:32_5: Tattha ca abhidhammaṁ patvā sabhāvappadhānaṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n8:32_7: Tasmā abhidhamma nayena vipassanā attano nimitta nāmaṁ maggassa dātuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0401n8:32_13: Taṁ puggalaṁ niccanimitta subhanimitta sukhanimitta attanimittāni gāhenti.
anya-e0401n8:32_15: Taṁ puggalaṁ ārammaṇesu bhusaṁ nihitaṁ niviṭṭhaṁ karonti.
anya-e0401n8:32_17: Te ca maggaphalāni ārammaṇaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0401n8:32_19: Evaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇā divasena maggaphalesu tesaṁ abhāvo.
anya-e0401n8:32_20: Abhāvattāeva ca tāni maggaphalāni attano dhammatāya tīṇināmāni labhantīti dassetuṁ ‘‘ārammaṇa karaṇavasenavā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_0: ‘‘Attadiṭṭhiyā uppannāya uppajjantī’’ti idaṁ tāsaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ attadiṭṭhiyā avinābhāvaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:33_1: Na pana attadiṭṭhiyā tāhi avinābhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_5: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsampayuttā akusaladhammā diṭṭhivicikicchāggahaṇena gahitāti āha ‘‘diṭṭhivicikicchā vippayuttā’’ti.
anya-e0401n8:33_26: Vikappatthehi sati dve eva sattakkhattuparamā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n8:33_29: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthassa gahitattā eko missakabhavo eva labbhati.
anya-e0401n8:33_30: Nanu ca saddo nāma samuccayatthe pākaṭo,
anya-e0401n8:33_32: Tasmā samuccayatthova idha yuttoti ce. Na yutto. Kasmā.
anya-e0401n8:33_34: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana samuccayatthaṁ gahetvā te dve puggalā imasmiṁ pāṭhe asaṅgahitāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_37: Na hi koci sattakkhattu paramo nāma idha asaṅgahitoti yuttoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_40: Paramo nāma vutto’’ti idaṁ upari ‘ye kāmabhave yevā’tiādinā ‘yediṭṭha dhamme vā’tiādinā ca yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_41: So ca sukkhavipassako vā parihīnajjhāno vā daṭṭhabboti sambandho.
anya-e0401n8:33_43: ‘‘Idha niṭṭhā’’ti imasmiṁ kāmaloke āsavakkhayaṁ patvā khandhaparinibbānapatti vasena niṭṭhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_47: Ekameva paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṁ bhavabījaṁ assa atthīti ekabījī.
anya-e0401n8:33_50: Kena pana tiṇṇaṁ sotāpannānaṁ viseso katoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_51: Sattakkhattu paramo tāva kevalaṁ pathamamagga sampayuttehi indriyehi kato.
anya-e0401n8:33_52: Itare dve uparimaggatthāya pavattitehi vipassanindriyehi katoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_63: Tattha sattakkhattu paramo kevalena pathamamaggānubhāvena siddhattā sabbamuduko hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_64: Itare dvepakatiyā sattakkhattu paramabhāve ṭhatvā uparimaggatthāya vipassanā kammaṁ paṭṭhapenti.
anya-e0401n8:33_65: Tadā tesaṁ indriyāni puna visesa pattāni honti, tikkhāni.
anya-e0401n8:33_66: Tasmā te sattakkhattu paramato tikkhānāma hontīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_67: ‘‘Sattavārato oraṁ vā’’ti idaṁ kolaṁkola ekabījino sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_68: ‘‘Upari tiṇṇaṁ maggānaṁ vipassanā niyāmetī’’ti idaṁ uparime dvesotāpanne sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_70: Tathāhi soyeva saṅgahapāṭhe sarūpato āgato sotāpatti maggaṁ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano
anya-e0401n8:33_72: Itare pana dve pāḷiyaṁ sotāpanna puggalavibhāgaṭṭhānesveva āgatāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_76: Aṅguttarapāṭhe ‘‘tenacittappasādenā’’ti mahāsahassilokadhātuṁ sarena viññāpetuṁ samatthassa satthuguṇe cittappasādo jāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_78: ‘‘Tena pariyāyenā’’ti sace so devesu eva saṁsarati.
anya-e0401n8:33_79: Sattakkhattuṁ opapātika paṭisandhiyo gaṇhitvā tattheva parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0401n8:33_82: Evaṁ desanā vārena cuddasa katvā desitena pariyāyenāti attho.
anya-e0401n8:33_83: ‘‘Taṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ’’ti vadantena ṭīkācariyena sayaṁ cuddasapaṭisandhiyova icchatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n8:33_94: ‘‘Abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassā’’ti sattabhavato uddhaṁ kāmabhave paṭisandhijanakassa kusalā kusalakamma viññāṇassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_98: Ete nāma rūpadhammā ettha etasmiṁ abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhantīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n8:33_100: ‘‘Tadekaṭṭhamohassā’’ti tena rāgena tena dosena ekasmiṁ citte ekato ṭhitassa mohassa.
anya-e0401n8:33_111: Adhiccuppatti nāma pubbe yathāpavattaṁ kālaṁ adhicca atikkamma uppatti .
anya-e0401n8:33_114: ‘‘Methunavatthu samāyogo icchito’’ti jāyampatīnaṁ methunakammasamāyogo nāma sakadāgāmīnaṁ atthīti icchito.
anya-e0401n8:33_122: Keci imaṁ vatthuṁ disvā mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṁ na rocenti.
anya-e0401n8:33_125: ‘‘Sakadāgāmittaṁ byākataṁ’’ti tasmiṁ kālaṅkate so brāhmaṇo idha sakadāgāmibhāvaṁ patvā tusitākāyaṁ upapannoti
anya-e0401n8:33_126: evaṁ tassa yaṁ sakadāgāmittaṁ bhagavatā byākataṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_128: Na pana abrahmacārino sato adhigamavasenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n8:33_129: Maraṇāsannakālepi hi sikkhāpadādhiṭṭhānena saha uparimaggaphalādhigamanaṁ nāma tikkhapaññassa ariyasāvakassa na dukkaranti.
anya-e0401n8:33_131: ‘‘Sakiṁdeva imaṁlokaṁ āgantvā’’ti etena ito paralokaṁ gamanassa ca tato puna idhāgamanassa ca siddhattā
anya-e0401n8:33_132: ayaṁ puggalo suddhena magganiyāmena kāmabhave dvikkhattu paramonāma hotīti siddho. Kathaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:33_133: Idha patvā tattha nibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e0401n8:33_134: tattha patvā idha nibbattitvā tattha parinibbāyīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_135: Sesāpana cattāro vipassanāniyāmena siddhā hontīti viññāyati.
anya-e0401n8:33_141: Ettha ca tīsu sotāpannesu ekosattakkhattu paramo eva magganiyāmena siddho.
anya-e0401n8:33_142: Sesā pana dve sotāpannā vipassanāniyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_143: Cha sakadāgāmīsu dve eva magganiyāmena siddhā.
anya-e0401n8:33_145: Tattha maggasiddhesu sotāpanna sakadāgāmīsu saṅkaro natthi.
anya-e0401n8:33_151: Āgamanasīlo āgamana dhammo hutvā sakadāgāmī nāmāti attho.
anya-e0401n8:33_157: Sīlakkhandhādiguṇā nāma sīlakkhandha samādhikkhandha paññākkhandha vimuttikkhandha vimuttiññāṇa dassanakkhandhaguṇā.
anya-e0401n8:33_165: Na pana vuttaṁ vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti.
anya-e0401n8:33_167: Kasmā pana vīriyavāhī maggaṁ bhāvetīti na vuttanti. Vuccate.
anya-e0401n8:33_168: Maggaṁ bhāventassa nāma ādimhi diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ pahānāya kammaṁ mahantaṁ hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n8:33_170: Tattha saddhā ca vicikicchā ca dve ujuppaṭipakkhā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_180: Api ca saddhā attano visaye diṭṭhiṁ vidhamatiyeva.
anya-e0401n8:33_182: Tasmā āraddha vipassako aniccādīsu aveccappasādamattenapi diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahitvā saddhānusāribhāvañca
anya-e0401n8:33_184: Paññāya aniccādīni nijjhānakkhamaṁ katvā dhammānusāribhāvañca suṭṭhutaraṁ passitvā diṭṭhipattapaññā vimuttabhāvañca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_185: Vīriyaṁ pana diṭṭhivicikicchānaṁ paṭipakkhamattampi na hoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_193: Kutopana attano sabhāvena diṭṭhivicikicchāyo pajahituṁ sakkhissati.
anya-e0401n8:33_194: Tasmā imasmiṁ ṭhāne vīriyavāhīti ca vīriyadhuroti ca na vuttoti.
anya-e0401n8:33_195: Kāyasakkhimhi pana saddhā ca paññā ca samabalā honti.
anya-e0401n8:33_196: Vīriyañca sayaṁ sammappadhānaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tadubhayaṁ upabrūheti.
anya-e0401n8:33_197: So ca puggalo tadubhayabalena diṭṭhivicikicchādayo pajahitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_198: Aṭṭhavimokkhe vā uppādetvā ubhatobhāga vimuttabhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0401n8:33_199: Imesu pana dvīsu puggalesu vīriyassa thāmo suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
anya-e0401n8:33_209: ‘‘Tayo antarā parinibbāyino’’ti ettha āyukappassa pariyantaṁ apatvā antarā eva kilesaparinibbānapattā antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
anya-e0401n8:33_218: Vipassanā kammaṁ sasaṅkhāraṁ sappayogaṁ katvā parinibbāyī sasaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n8:33_219: Saṅkhārarahitena sukhena vipassanā kammena parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī.
anya-e0401n8:33_221: Te eva catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā dvādasa.
anya-e0401n8:34_5: Āruppesu ca tasso arūpasamāpattiyo eva atthi.
anya-e0401n8:34_12: Nānattasaññā nāma kasiṇa nimittato aññesu nānārammaṇesu pavattamanoviññāṇa saññā.
anya-e0401n8:34_13: Dutīyajjhāne vitakka vicārānaṁ nirodhotiādinā anupubba nirodho.
anya-e0401n8:34_19: ‘‘Samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanāvasenā’’ti ettha vasibhāvapattaṁ samāpajjanañca vuṭṭhānañca gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_20: Attano sarīrā baddhesu parikkhāresu samāpattibaleneva antarāyābhāvato visuṁ adhiṭṭhātabba kiccaṁ natthīti
anya-e0401n8:34_29: Maraṇañhi nāma samāpattibalenapi paṭibāhituṁ na sakkāhoti.
anya-e0401n8:34_30: Anto samāpattiyañca maraṇe sati sabrahmacārīsu kattabbavattaṁ na kareyya.
anya-e0401n8:34_31: Etañhi vattaṁ yaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṁ vā upaṭṭhākānaṁ vā appamādakathānu sāsanikammaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:34_35: Yaṁ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu maraṇaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0401n8:35_4: Tattha ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi.
anya-e0401n8:35_8: Yaṁ loke dibbaṁ sukhaṁ mānusakaṁ sukhanti mamāyanti.
anya-e0401n8:35_9: Yañca anubhavantaṁ mahājanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti.
anya-e0401n8:35_10: Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṁ pana nirāmisasukhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:35_11: Yaṁ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:35_12: Yañca anubhavantaṁ ariyajanaṁ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti.
anya-e0401n8:35_13: ‘‘Assāditabbaṭṭhenā’’ti kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṁ ahosukhanti udāharantenapi assāditabbaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0401n8:38_8: ‘‘Abhivuḍḍhānaṁ’’ti hānabhāgiya ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvaṁ atikkammavisesabhāgiya nibbedhabhāgiya bhāvapattivasena atissaya vuḍḍhānaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_13: Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.
anya-e0401n8:38_19: Kathaṁ nu kho ime janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṁ pavatto cittabyāpāro.
anya-e0401n8:38_22: ‘‘Patthitaṁ’’ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṁ thero evarūpaṁ pakaraṇaṁ kareyyāti evaṁ cirakālaṁ patthitaṁ āsiṁsitanti attho.
anya-e0401n8:38_27: ‘‘Saddo’’ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṁ maṅgalahatthiṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0401n8:38_28: Netaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ raññā katanti evaṁ pavatto amanāpasaddo.
anya-e0401n8:38_36: nānābhayupaddavā tasmiṁ nuppajjantīti lokasammato maṅgalahatthī hoti.
anya-e0401n8:38_53: Taṁ ādi etissā paññāyāti pariyattivesārajjādi paññā.
anya-e0401n8:38_55: Pāpaṁ dhammaṁ garahantiādīnavaṁ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.
anya-e0401n8:38_61: Loke bahūsu dassanesu ito uttaraṁ aññaṁ dassanaṁ nāma natthīti dassanānuttariyaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:38_66: Tesu ratanattayādīsu saddhā paṭilābho lābhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_68: Ratanattaye catūhi paccayehi vā vattappaṭivattakaraṇena vā paricaraṇaṁ pāricariyānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_69: Buddhapaññattāsu tīsu sikkhāsu samādāya sikkhanaṁ sikkhānuttariyaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n8:38_70: Tādise paññāvadātaguṇasobhādike guṇe avassaṁ bhajanti pāpuṇantīti tādisaguṇabhāgino.
anya-e0401n8:40_10: āgate aññattha gantuṁ na detīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n8:40_12: ‘‘Sāke’’ti sākanāmena raññā puna saṅkhatattā imaṁ kaliyugaṁ sākanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n8:40_14: Sākarājā ca nāma uttarāpathesu eko gandhārarājā.
anya-e0401n8:40_15: Yaṁ jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā bhinnaladdhikā vajjībhikkhū imaṁ dhamma vinayaṁ mahāsaṅghīkaṁ nāma saṅgahaṁ āropenti.
anya-e0401n8:40_26: ‘‘La tī’’ti sālikkhettānaṁ sodhanaṭṭhānattā evaṁ mrammadesavohārena laddhanāmaṁ araññaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_27: Taṁ pana muṁrvānagarassa esanne pañcadhanusatike padese jātaṁ.
anya-e0401n8:40_29: Sārañca asārañca vivecenti vicāretvā jānantisīlenāti sārāsāra vivekinoti vacanatthoti.
anya-e0401n8:42_0: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
anya-e0401n8:43_0: Teneve sā katā hoti, ayaṁ tassānu dīpanī.
anya-e0401n8:45_0: Kāḷe navamiyaṁ divā, majjhanhike niṭṭhaṁ gatā.
